parameter.name: geo_input_file_name
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the GeoPoints code field(s)

parameter.name: polyline_input_latitudes
parameter.documentation: Array containing the latitudes of the polylines. Each polyline is separated by the break value

parameter.name: polyline_input_longitudes
parameter.documentation: Array containing the longitudes of the polylines. Each polyline is separated by the break value

parameter.name: polyline_input_values
parameter.documentation: Array containing the values for each polyline

parameter.name: polyline_input_break_indicator
parameter.documentation: Value used as either a latitude or longitude to denote a separation between polylines

parameter.name: polyline_input_positions_filename
parameter.documentation: Path to a file containing the coordinates for all polylines' points.

parameter.name: polyline_input_values_filename
parameter.documentation: Path to a file containing the values for each polyline.

parameter.name: legend
parameter.documentation: Turn the legend on

parameter.name: polyline_line_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of the polylines

parameter.name: polyline_line_style
parameter.documentation: Style of the polylines (SOLID/ DASH/ DOT/ CHAIN_DASH/ CHAIN_DOT)

parameter.name: polyline_line_thickness
parameter.documentation: Thickness of the polylines

parameter.name: polyline_level_count
parameter.documentation: Count or number of levels to be plotted. Magics will try to find "nice levels", this means that the number of levels could be slightly different from the requested number of levels

parameter.name: polyline_level_tolerance
parameter.documentation: Tolerance: Do not use "nice levels" if the number of levels is really to different [count +/- tolerance]

parameter.name: polyline_reference_level
parameter.documentation: Level from which the level interval is calculated

parameter.name: polyline_interval
parameter.documentation: Interval in data units between different bands of shading

parameter.name: polyline_level_list
parameter.documentation: List of shading band levels to be plotted

parameter.name: polyline_shade
parameter.documentation: Whether to shade polygons or not (ON/OFF)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_max_level
parameter.documentation: Maximum level for which shading is required

parameter.name: polyline_shade_min_level
parameter.documentation: Minimum level for which shading is required

parameter.name: polyline_shade_level_selection_type
parameter.documentation: Can be set to one of: (COUNT/ INTERVAL/ LEVEL_LIST)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_method
parameter.documentation: Method of generating the colours of the bands in polygon shading (LIST/CALCULATE)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_max_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Highest shading band colour

parameter.name: polyline_shade_min_level_colour
parameter.documentation: Lowest shading band colour

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_direction
parameter.documentation: Direction of colour sequencing for shading (CLOCKWISE/ ANTI_CLOCKWISE)

parameter.name: polyline_shade_colour_list
parameter.documentation: List of colours to be used in polygon shading.

parameter.name: mapgen_input_file_name
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the MapGen data

parameter.name: mapgen_record
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the MapGen data to plot

parameter.name: shape_input_file_name
parameter.documentation: The name of the input file containing the shape data ( geography only)
